conversations.content:
I'm looking to book a hotel in Paris for May 1st to May 5th.
Can you suggest a hotel that's under 210? If there are a few choices, go for the one with the highest rating.
Please give me the hotel's name, rating, price range. Also, can you add an event called "Booking hotel {hotel_name}" to my calendar on April 25th 2024, and set the location to the hotel's address? Just to remind me to book ahead of time. Thanks!

<function_thought>
To fulfill your request, the first step is to gather information about hotels in Paris. I will use the function to get all available hotels in the specified city. After that, I will filter them based on the price range of under 210, then check their ratings and reviews to find the one with the highest rating. Once I have the hotel information, I will add an event to your calendar for the booking reminder using the hotel's name and address.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_hotels_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Hotel Names: Le Marais Boutique
Good Night
Luxury Palace
Montmartre Suites

<function_thought>
I have retrieved a list of hotels in Paris: "Le Marais Boutique", "Good Night", "Luxury Palace", and "Montmartre Suites". The next step is to get the price range for these hotels to determine which ones are under 210. I will proceed with this step now.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_hotels_prices(hotel_names=["Le Marais Boutique", "Good Night", "Luxury Palace", "Montmartre Suites"])]</function_call>
